漢羅台文: 熱情敢有法度對抗時代的變遷、佮華語市場捙拚？
台羅: jia̍t-tsîng kám ū-huat-tōo tuì-khòng sî-tāi ê piàn-tshian, kah Huâ-gí tshī-tiûnn tshia-piànn?
台羅數字調: jiat8-tsing5 kam2 u7-huat4-too7 tui3-khong3 si5-tai7 e5 pian3-tshian1,kah4 hua5-gi2 tshi7-tiunn5 tshia1-piann3?
白話字: jia̍t-chêng kám ū-hoat-tō͘ tùi-khòng sî-tāi ê piàn-chhian,kah Hôa-gí chhī-tiûⁿ chhia-piàⁿ?
